definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
(onom.) giggling/breathing/tearing of paper, ripping of fabric etc

sentences.english: He snorted and then said, “They want to go up north.
sentences.chinese: 他呼哧呼哧喘着氣，然後說，“他們想去北邊。

sentences.english: He snorted and then said, “They want to go up north.
sentences.chinese: 他呼哧呼哧喘着氣，然後說，“他們想去北邊。

sentences.english: However, they occasionally snort, hiss, or bark.
sentences.chinese: 不過啞天鵝偶爾會發出呼哧聲，噓聲，或吼聲。

sentences.english: Denise huffs and puffs, several steps behind Richard.
sentences.chinese: 丹妮絲呼哧呼哧喘着氣落在理查德身後幾步。

sentences.english: Denise huffs and puffs, several steps behind Richard.
sentences.chinese: 丹妮絲呼哧呼哧喘着氣落在理查德身後幾步。

sentences.english: A barrel-organ was wheezing out an old tune.
sentences.chinese: 一架手搖風琴正在呼哧呼哧地奏着一首古老的曲子。

sentences.english: A barrel-organ was wheezing out an old tune.
sentences.chinese: 一架手搖風琴正在呼哧呼哧地奏着一首古老的曲子。

sentences.english: He chomped his way through two hot dogs.
sentences.chinese: 他呼哧呼哧地喫掉了兩個熱狗。

sentences.english: He chomped his way through two hot dogs.
sentences.chinese: 他呼哧呼哧地喫掉了兩個熱狗。
這架舊風琴呼哧呼哧地響。
這架舊風琴呼哧呼哧地響。

sentences.english: John answered with the loudness of his breathing.
sentences.chinese: 喬用呼哧呼哧的喘氣聲來回答這個問題。

sentences.english: John answered with the loudness of his breathing.
sentences.chinese: 喬用呼哧呼哧的喘氣聲來回答這個問題。

sentences.english: Frog went leaping over rock, and Toad came puffing up behind him.
sentences.chinese: 青蛙一蹦一跳地越過岩石，蟾蜍呼哧呼哧地跟在後面。

sentences.english: Frog went leaping over rock, and Toad came puffing up behind him.
sentences.chinese: 青蛙一蹦一跳地越過岩石，蟾蜍呼哧呼哧地跟在後面。

sentences.english: He whoofed into the hand mike experimentally before the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 會前他向話筒裏呼哧呼哧地吹氣試驗音響效果。

definition: (onom.) sound of the wind or the breathing of sb who is sound asleep
(onom.) to squeak (of mice)/to chirp or peep (of small birds)
(onom.) giggling/breathing/tearing of paper, ripping of fabric etc
(onom.) patter, splatter, click/to smack one's lips/to pull (on a pipe)
out of breath (idiom)/to gasp for air
pinyin: shang4 qi4 bu4 jie1 xia4 qi4

definition: hiss/neigh/Ss! (sound of air sucked between the teeth, indicating hesitation or thinking over)
to breathe heavily like an ox (idiom)/to huff and puff
